title: XML-RPC API - Data types specifications
description:
ISO8601-based datetime format used in Sippy (starting from 5.1 version)

The following datetime format based on ISO8601 is supported:

YYYYMMDDThh:mm:ss


Note, the date should be set in UTC format only, with no timezone specified!


Example:

20171215T13:30:00


ISO3166 country codes format used in Sippy

Data should be sent according to official document:

https://www.iso.org/ru/iso-3166-country-codes.html


Example of country code of Turkey:

2 letters - TR

3 letters - TUR


ISO4217 currency codes format used in Sippy

Data should be sent according to official document:

https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html


Example of country code of Turkey:

3 letters - TRY
